summary.description: Inventory and diagnostics report for the project located in the provided repository.  This report enumerates files, languages, dependencies and initial observations of the current state.
summary.project_type: JavaScript/Node.js slide generator with Python utilities

subdirectories.name: node_modules
subdirectories.note: Contains thirdâ€‘party packages installed via npm (not included individually here due to size).

notes: All JavaScript files use CommonJS syntax and rely on the pptxgenjs library to produce PowerPoint presentations.
Python utilities depend on Pillow and pdf2image. The conversion script invokes LibreOffice (soffice) and may require that binary to be installed in runtime environments.
No continuous integration (CI) or testing framework is present in the repository.
There is no Dockerfile or container specification for running the project.
No unit tests or linting configuration are currently provided.
